mean_cn: n. 上瘾的人；  v. 使沉迷，使上瘾
mean_en: a person who is unable to stop taking harmful drugs; a person who is very interested in something and spends a lot of their free time on it
sentence: The boy is a cellphone addict, he takes it wherever he goes.
sentence_trans: 这个男生对手机上瘾，不管去哪他都带着手机。
word_etyma: ad一再 + dict说 → 一再说起 → 对…入迷 → addict上瘾
